long_description: Load up and go with the Thule Raceway Platform2 Bike Trunk Rack. It offers easy installation, precise adjustment and hassle-free loading for up to 2 bikes. Injection-molded nylon and extruded aluminum frame construction is lightweight and strong; molded rubber pads at contact points protect your vehicle. Rack comes preassembled with 4 attachment straps (with vinyl-coated steel cables) to secure the rack to your vehicle. Oversize, easy-to-grip ratcheting knobs make mounting and adjusting bike rack easy so you can dial in a perfect fit. Bike arms and trays fold away when not in use, and antisway cages secure bikes for transport. The Thule Raceway Platform2 Bike Trunk Rack fits a wide range of vehicle styles: sedans, hatchbacks and minivans; compatible with most factory spoilers.
short_description: Load up and go with the Thule Raceway Platform2 Bike Trunk Rack. It offers easy installation, precise adjustment and hassle-free loading for up to 2 bikes.
